result.title: Data Management
result.description: The research data to be opened will include datasets with data metrics and procedures for benchmarking purposes as well as technical data needed to validate the results presented in the deposited scientific publications In order to manage the collection processing and openness of research data during and after the project an extended Data Management Plan will be developed in an early stage M8 to be updated during the project M24 and M48 The Plan will include instructions on archiving and presentation of data legibility standards and specifications of all data acquisition sufficient for data reproducibility Costs related to open access have been considered in the estimated budget of the project
